name: MKPolyline
desc: An open polygon overlay consisting of one or more connected line segments.

items.name: init(points: UnsafePointer<MKMapPoint>, count: Int)
items.desc: Creates a polyline object from the specified set of map points.

items.name: init(coordinates: UnsafePointer<CLLocationCoordinate2D>, count: Int)
items.desc: Creates a polyline object from the specified set of coordinates.
